name: AquaTetra
description:
AquaTetra is a bullet hell shmup assembled for the Amaze Me Game Jam. Play as Tetra, a bioluminescent neon mermaid as she takes on the forces of Seraph, the Angelfish in a neon-lit underwater cityscape.

Art and animations - GhostlyFeline (Typhoon Unit)

Bullet shot textures - Jackie Matthews (Discord: Jackie Matthews#3217)

Programming  - Taizen Chisou (Lunacy Indeterminate Discord Server)

Music - Iasper (AquaTetra music)

Sound effect design - Rakaasac (Noetic Nightjar)
